description.value: Through extensive study and dangerous research, the character has become an expert on alien species, able to draw upon general xenos knowledge even without specific training.

system.benefit: Character can attempt any Forbidden Lore (Xenos) Test in which they are not trained in as if it were an untrained, non-specialist skill (Base -20 Test).

specialAbilities.name: Broad Xenos Knowledge
specialAbilities.description: You can attempt any Forbidden Lore (Xenos) Test for species you are not specifically trained in as an untrained, non-specialist skill (at -20 penalty rather than being unable to attempt it).
